column1: Estimated amounts have been removed from 1879 and 1895. The observer was Fergus Armstrong MD.
The 1880s sheet notes that St. Lawrence Church was 150 yards NW of the gauge. This locates the gauge on Boroughgate.
An internet search confirmed that Armstrong lived on Boroughgate. The NGR is from an OS map. The altitude on the map agrees with the altitude on the sheets.
